name: Espresso
steps: Add Water to espresso machine, and preheat along with portafilter
Grind Coffee Beans to a Fine size ('1.33' for 12 seconds on Jake's conical burr grinder)
Tamp grounds into portafilter with ~30 pounds of pressure
Run espresso machine until 2oz of espresso have poured out (~15 seconds)
Clean everything soon after, it tends to get somewhat dirty quickly
